Boyle evacuated as nearby wildfire being fought in Athabasca County
Description
2 hours ago
The village of Boyle, home to around 900 people, was emptied after a wildfire to the south was blown north, coming within 1.6 kilometres of the village in Athabasca County. Erik Bay spoke to area residents and community officials about the scary situation.
